verses.verse: By the rivers <S%H5104><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, There we sat down <S%H3427><s%>, yea <S%H1058><s%>, we wept, When we remembered <S%H2142><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
Upon the willows <S%H6155><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof We hanged <S%H8518><s%> up our harps <S%H3658><s%>.

For there they that led us captive <S%H7617><s%> required <S%H7592><s%> of us songs <S%H1697><s%>, And they that wasted <S%H8437><s%> us required of us mirth <S%H8057><s%>, saying <S%H7891><s%>, Sing us one of the songs <S%H7892><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>.
How shall we sing <S%H7891><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s song <S%H7892><s%> In a foreign <S%H5236><s%> land <S%H127><s%>?
If I forget <S%H7911><s%> thee <S%H3389><s%>, O Jerusalem, Let my right hand <S%H3225><s%> forget her skill <S%H7911><s%>.

Let my tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleave <S%H1692><s%> to the roof of my mouth <S%H2441><s%>, If I remember <S%H2142><s%> thee not <S%H5927><s%>; If I prefer not Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> Above my chief <S%H7218><s%> joy <S%H8057><s%>.

Remember <S%H2142><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> The day <S%H3117><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>; Who said <S%H559><s%>, Rase <S%H6168><s%> it <S%H6168><s%>, rase it <S%H3247><s%>, Even to the foundation thereof.
O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>, that art to be destroyed <S%H7703><s%>, Happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be <S%H7999><s%>, that rewardeth thee As thou hast served us <S%H1580><s%>.
Happy <S%H835><s%> shall he be <S%H270><s%>, that taketh and dasheth <S%H5310><s%> thy little ones <S%H5768><s%> Against the rock <S%H5553><s%>.
